testcase.name: TC04 Kullanici amazon sayfasinin title'nin dogru oldugunu kontrol eder
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici amazon anasayfaya gider.....................................passed Then Title'in Amazon icerdigini test eder...................................passed And Sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed

testcase.name: TC07 Amazon Samsung Testi
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici amazon anasayfaya gider.....................................passed When Samsung icin arama yapar...............................................passed Then Arama sonuclarinin Samsung icerdigini test eder........................passed And Sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed

testcase.name: TC09 Amazon Java Testi
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici "amazonUrl" anasayfaya gider................................passed When "Java" icin arama yapar................................................passed Then Arama sonuclarinin "Java" icerdigini test eder.........................passed And Sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
